**sizes**
toddler (child, adult small, adult medium, adult large, adult x-large)
to fit approximately 5.5 (6.5, 7, 8, 8.5, 9.5)” / 14 (16.5, 18, 20, 21.5, 24) cm

**yarn**

the sample was knit using ruby and roses plump rose sock set 100 grams, 400 yards / 365
meters, 85% superwash merino, 15% nylon, 2 ply shown in sock mania sock set

**needles**
us 5 / 3.75 mm or size needed to obtain correct gauge
sample was knit using 32” / 81 cm cable with the magic loop method

**gauge**
22 stitches x 32 rows per 4” / 10 cm

**notions**
tapestry needle
stitch marker
